key_decisions.original_text: EIP-8037 DevNet-3: hardcode cost-per-byte using 100M gas formula; full dynamic version on DevNet-4
key_decisions.context: hardcoded at 100M gas; dynamic deferred to devnet-4

key_decisions.original_text: testing_buildBlockV1 endpoint required for clients starting DevNet-4
EPBS DevNet-0 launches March 4th with minimum 3 clients ready
BloatNet focus: reliable automated bloating over speed; 2 months to 10x acceptable
